documents.t: Markdown page example
Paydock Integration
Direct Charge With 3ds
Direct Charge
Credit Card (No Stored Details)
Create a “Simple Widget” using the Paydock Client-SDK
Create a session vault token
Create an authorised charge with 3ds using the session vault token
Create a “3ds Canvas Widget”
Finalise the charge using the charge_3ds_id
Credit Card (No Stored Details)
Create a “Simple Widget” using the Paydock Client-SDK
Create a session vault token
Create charge using the session vault token
Credit Card (stored details)
Create a “Simple Widget” using the Paydock Client-SDK
Create a permanent vault token
Create charge using the permanent vault token
Create the Customer
You don't need React to write simple standalone pages.

documents.s: Create a “Simple Widget” using the Paydock Client-SDK

documents.t: Take the one time token from the payment_source_token field and create a session vault token Session vault token request POST /v1/vault/payment_sources HTTP/1.1 Host: api.paydock.com x-user-public-key: {{public-key}} Content-Type: application/json { "token": "6311c15f-8024-42f9-8ed5-200621ecfb1d", "vault_type": "session" } Session vault response { "status": 201, "error": null, "resource": { "type": "payment_source", "data": { "type": "card", "_source_ip_address": "x.x.x.x", "vault_type": "session", "expire_month": 12, "expire_year": 2023, "card_name": "John Smith", "card_scheme": "visa", "card_number_last4": "4242", "card_number_bin": "42424242", "ref_token": "9653863864182813", "status": "active", "created_at": "2023-11-01T00:13:22.084Z", "company_id": "65235992df412413b29a8f3b", "vault_token": "996280fe-961c-4f84-9e99-e490402c48b1", "updated_at": "2023-11-01T00:13:59.412Z" } } }

Using the resource.data.vault_token. Create an authorised charge with 3ds request POST /v1/charges/3ds HTTP/1.1 Host: api-sandbox.paydock.com x-user-public-key: {{public-key}} Content-Type: application/json { "amount": "103", "currency": "AUD", "customer": { "payment_source": { "vault_token": "session-vault-token", "gateway_id": "gateway-id" } }, "_3ds": { "browser_details": { "name": "CHROME", "java_enabled": "true", "language": "en-US", "screen_height": "640", "screen_width": "480", "time_zone": "273", "color_depth": "24" } } } Sample authorised charge with 3ds response { "status": 201, "error": null, "resource": { "type": "charge", "data": { "_3ds": { "id": "4c925017-5676-4a7e-afa7-710a7374591e", "token": "" }, "status": "pre_authentication_pending" } } }
documents.s: Create an authorised charge with 3ds using the session vault token

documents.t:
Using the resource.data._3ds.token. Create a 3ds Canvas Widget
Sample response from the 3ds canvas widget { "event": "chargeAuth", "purpose": "secure3d", "message_source": "widget.paydock", "ref_id": "", "widget_id": "bbde2909-1606-4369-8ca2-f5a54c248033", "charge_3ds_id": "bbde2909-1606-4369-8ca2-f5a54c248033", "status": "authenticated" }

Using the charge_3ds_id from the response above. Perform a charge with the following request POST /v1/charges HTTP/1.1 Host: api.paydock.com Content-Type: application/json x-user-public-key: {{public-key}} { "amount": "103", "currency": "AUD", "reference": "some_reference", "description": "some_description", "_3ds": { "id": "bbde2909-1606-4369-8ca2-f5a54c248033" } } Sample response from the 3ds charge { "status": 201, "error": null, "resource": { "type": "charge", "data": { "transfer": { "items": [] }, "schedule": { "stopped": false }, "statistics": { "total_refunded_amount": 0, "full_refund": false, "need_sync": true }, "customer": { "payment_source": { "card_name": "Wanda Mertz", "card_number_last4": "0008", "card_number_bin": "51234500", "card_scheme": "mastercard", "expire_month": 1, "expire_year": 2039, "gateway_id": "65235b464771c64d6774b38d", "gateway_type": "MasterCard", "gateway_name": "MasterCard", "type": "card", "vault_token": "3cce45ad-8c91-4d06-ba53-f511bfce676d", "items": [] } }, "_3ds": { "id": "bbde2909-1606-4369-8ca2-f5a54c248033", "token": "" }, "type": "financial", "status": "complete", "capture": true, "authorization": false, "archived": false, "one_off": true, "_source_ip_address": "220.233.78.99", "_id": "6541c5e4bda7c3b6f5708279", "logs_migrated": false, "amount": 103, "currency": "AUD", "company_id": "65235992df412413b29a8f3b", "items": [], "transactions": [ { "_3ds": { "gateway_status": "AUTHENTICATION_SUCCESSFUL", "challenge": true, "gateway_result": "SUCCESS", "gateway_recommendation": "PROCEED" }, "type": "3ds", "status": "complete", "gateway_specific_code": null, "gateway_specific_description": null, "error_message": null, "error_code": null, "status_code": null, "status_code_description": null, "_id": "6541c5e4bda7c3b6f570827c", "amount": 100, "currency": "AUD", "created_at": "2023-11-01T03:28:36.891Z", "updated_at": "2023-11-01T03:30:18.341Z", "amount_fee": null, "processed_at": "2023-11-01T03:28:39.397Z", "amount_surcharge": null, "amount_original": null }, { "type": "sale", "status": "complete", "gateway_specific_code": null, "gateway_specific_description": null, "error_message": null, "error_code": null, "status_code": null, "status_code_description": null, "_id": "6541c71af84466b6ef143973", "currency": "AUD", "amount": 100, "amount_fee": null, "amount_surcharge": null, "amount_original": null, "created_at": "2023-11-01T03:33:46.101Z", "external_id": "f7d60cbc-af08-4fea-9780-f2c61648c0f5:dd282916-4399-4338-a345-d07856b2c005", "external_reference": "330503103837", "processed_at": "2023-11-01T03:33:47.603Z" } ], "created_at": "2023-11-01T03:28:36.873Z", "updated_at": "2023-11-01T03:33:47.603Z", "amount_surcharge": null, "amount_original": null, "__v": 2, "external_id": "f7d60cbc-af08-4fea-9780-f2c61648c0f5:dd282916-4399-4338-a345-d07856b2c005", "reference": "some_reference", "description": "some_description" } } }
documents.s: Finalise the charge using the charge_3ds_id
Create a “Simple Widget” using the Paydock Client-SDK

documents.t: Take the one time token from the payment_source_token field and create a session vault token Session vault token request POST /v1/vault/payment_sources HTTP/1.1 Host: api.paydock.com x-user-public-key: {{public-key}} Content-Type: application/json { "token": "6311c15f-8024-42f9-8ed5-200621ecfb1d", "vault_type": "session" } Session vault response { "status": 201, "error": null, "resource": { "type": "payment_source", "data": { "type": "card", "_source_ip_address": "x.x.x.x", "vault_type": "session", "expire_month": 12, "expire_year": 2023, "card_name": "John Smith", "card_scheme": "visa", "card_number_last4": "4242", "card_number_bin": "42424242", "ref_token": "9653863864182813", "status": "active", "created_at": "2023-11-01T00:13:22.084Z", "company_id": "65235992df412413b29a8f3b", "vault_token": "996280fe-961c-4f84-9e99-e490402c48b1", "updated_at": "2023-11-01T00:13:59.412Z" } } }

Using the resource.data.vault_token. Create a charge request POST /v1/charges HTTP/1.1 Host: api.paydock.com x-user-public-key: {{public-key}} Content-Type: application/json { "amount": "10.00", "currency": "AUD", "customer": { "payment_source": { "vault_token": "996280fe-961c-4f84-9e99-e490402c48b1" } } } Sample charge response { "status": 201, "error": null, "resource": { "type": "charge", "data": { "transfer": { "items": [] }, "schedule": { "stopped": false }, "statistics": { "total_refunded_amount": 0, "full_refund": false, "need_sync": true }, "customer": { "payment_source": { "type": "card", "card_name": "John Smith", "card_number_last4": "4242", "expire_month": 12, "expire_year": 2023, "gateway_id": "65235b464771c64d6774b38d", "vault_token": "996280fe-961c-4f84-9e99-e490402c48b1", "card_scheme": "visa", "card_number_bin": "42424242", "gateway_name": "MasterCard", "gateway_type": "MasterCard", "items": [] } }, "type": "financial", "status": "complete", "capture": true, "authorization": false, "archived": false, "one_off": true, "_source_ip_address": "220.233.78.99", "_id": "65419867a0fe8fc32471b224", "company_id": "65235992df412413b29a8f3b", "amount": 13, "currency": "AUD", "items": [], "transactions": [ { "type": "sale", "status": "complete", "_source_ip_address": "220.233.78.99", "gateway_specific_code": null, "gateway_specific_description": null, "error_message": null, "error_code": null, "status_code": null, "status_code_description": null, "include_authorization": false, "_id": "65419867a0fe8fc32471b225", "created_at": "2023-11-01T00:14:31.103Z", "amount": 13, "external_reference": "330500102771", "processed_at": "2023-11-01T00:14:32.336Z" } ], "amount_surcharge": null, "amount_original": null, "updated_at": "2023-11-01T00:14:32.336Z", "created_at": documents.t: Take the one time token from the payment_source_token field and create a permanent vault token Permanent vault token request POST /v1/vault/payment_sources HTTP/1.1 Host: api.paydock.com x-user-public-key: {{public-key}} Content-Type: application/json { "token": "6311c15f-8024-42f9-8ed5-200621ecfb1d" } Permanent vault response { "status": 201, "error": null, "resource": { "type": "payment_source", "data": { "type": "card", "_source_ip_address": "x.x.x.x", "vault_type": "permanent", "expire_month": 1, "expire_year": 2039, "card_name": "Wanda Mertz", "card_scheme": "mastercard", "card_number_last4": "0008", "card_number_bin": "51234500", "ref_token": "9139516499300184", "status": "active", "created_at": "2023-11-02T02:13:09.832Z", "company_id": "65235992df412413b29a8f3b", "vault_token": "3dc68807-d6d9-44bc-89a3-4cd922131b01", "updated_at": "2023-11-02T02:13:27.960Z" } } }

Using the resource.data.vault_token. Create a charge request POST /v1/charges HTTP/1.1 Host: api.paydock.com x-user-public-key: {{public-key}} Content-Type: application/json { "amount": "10.00", "currency": "AUD", "customer": { documents.s: Create charge using the permanent vault token

documents.t: Using the permanent vault token created earlier along with the customer details POST /v1/customers HTTP/1.1 Host: api.paydock.com x-user-public-key: {{public-key}} Content-Type: application/json { "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Smith", "email": "johnsmith@paydock.com", "phone": "+61413444444", "payment_source": { "vault_token": "3dc68807-d6d9-44bc-89a3-4cd922131b01" } } Sample response from creating the customer { "status": 201, "error": null, "resource": { "type": "customer", "data": { "_id": "654306419a90eda1ebc4be73", "_source_ip_address": "x.x.x.x", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Smith", "email": "johnsmith@paydock.com", "phone": "+61413444444", "default_source": "654306419a90eda1ebc4be76", "status": "active", "archived": false, "created_at": "2023-11-02T02:15:29.267Z", "updated_at": "2023-11-02T02:15:29.315Z", "_check_expire_date": false, "statistics": { "successful_transactions": 0, "total_collected_amount": 0 }, "payment_sources": [ { "_id": "654306419a90eda1ebc4be76", "type": "card", "vault_token": "3dc68807-d6d9-44bc-89a3-4cd922131b01", "card_name": "Wanda Mertz", "card_number_bin": "51234500", "card_number_last4": "0008", "card_scheme": "mastercard", "expire_month": 1, "expire_year": 2039, "status": "active", "created_at": "2023-11-02T02:15:29.288Z", "updated_at": "2023-11-02T02:15:29.288Z" } ], "payment_destinations": [], "company_id": "65235992df412413b29a8f3b" } } }
